title: Stormcaller Secrets
tagline: in which the Dunmar Fellowship unravels ancient mysteries
summary: The Fellowship observes a missing constellation and investigates the anachronistic body of a recently deceased Chardonian.
Communicating with a tower yields a vision of a storm, a robed man, light, and pain.
Ascending Stormcaller Tower, they encounter a magical globe and a protective water creature.
Inside, they find a statue of a giant with missing eyes and encounter the giant Hralgar, who perceives the present as the future.
Realizing they're still in the tower, they find Hralgar chained and learn of his role and entrapment in ancient prophecies and politics.
short_summary: The Dunmar Fellowship discovers the trapped storm giant Hralgar and a statue with missing eyes, revealing ancient enchantments and prophecies within Stormcaller Tower.
